author: Staff Reporter
text:
Minister for Forests M. S.M. Anandan inaugurated the recreation park set up on the banks of Aandipalayam irrigation tank here at Rs. 1.22 crore.

The construction of the park that has a lawn, children’s play area, walking track, seating arrangements and a boat jetty was done by Public Works Department.

Official sources said that the boat jetty would be used at a later stage.

The park would be open to the public every day from 6.30 a.m. to 8 p.m.
title: Minister inaugurates park
